comment: Digital Marketing Analytics. By far one of the best classes I've taken in my major thus-far. Tyra is an awesome resource and vessel. If you do your work, you will pass. If you do your work and actually show that you care, you will get an A.
love her! only bad thing is she is a slow grader. Takes forever to see grade for various assignments. But shes great very clear straight to the point.
I would take all her classes again if i could because they were was that awesome.

Tyra is a great and entertaining teacher. She lets you know EXACTLY what's going to be on the tests the day before you take them. All tests are essay style questions, but they aren't hard at all if you pay attention at all. Most of the class and myself got A's on all of them. There is one solo ppt project, and the final can be taken with a partner.

Advertising isn't a hard class but Tyra made it easy and interesting to learn the ins and outs of the many different channels of Advertising. I'm glad I took her class because I know I learned pertinent information about the industry. All tests are passable with attendance and studying according to her study guide. I took her for 2 classes and Aced

Tyra is one of my favorite professors in Coles. It was difficult to hold back smiling during the final. I've never felt more prepared for an exam in my life. She is a very cool and understanding professor. Assignments are fair and reasonable I didn't buy the book and got High A's on tests. She allows you to work with a partner on the final as well.

Mrs. Mitchell is great!  Best class ever, makes advertising very interesting, she is really fair and always helps when you need it.  I learned a lot and now thanks to her and her class, I want to make my career in advertising.  Thanks Mrs. Mitchell!

Great professor, really likes what she does. She is willing to help if you ask. Quizzes and final are short essays, a bit tricky. Make sure you elaborate on your answers. Individual presentation and speaker portfolios. She takes a while to get grades back and didn't use the textbook.

I love Tyra! She knows so much about the Entertainment Inudstry. I also took her for Consumer Behavior. Her quizes are not always the easiest (usually written essays). I learned something everday. She is willing to help you with anything and is very approachable. I'd take her again!
Super easy class but she takes forever to get grades back. She's super boring and really hard to follow without falling asleep. I took her for an elective and I regret it everyday.

I took Tyra's summer course for Mktg 3800. She is such a fun teacher! Super easy class if you do all the work. There are just essay style quizzes, a group presentation and a guest speaker portfolio. NO TESTS! NO BOOK NEEDED! She is a little slow with posting/returning grades. Must take, great class and great teacher!!
Easy A but the professor is little bit too laid back, and tests are never graded on time.

Tyra has a great personality and is very competent. She loves what she does. Provided great examples of lecture topics via internet. Quizzes before each class based upon previous lecture material. There were a few mini assignments and a final project and presentation. Less structured but very flexible.

She tells you everything that's going to be on each test, including the final. You have to do a couple of case studies where you read and write a short paper on it. You have do one small paper over spring break. 3 tests. She doesn't care if you come to class. The only negative is that she likes to miss class and not tell anyone in advance.
Awesome personality, but very unorganized. Tests are easy because she gives you a study guide of EXACTLY what will be on it. She is very flexible and loves what she does.

She talks about how her complicated life causes her to miss commitments she makes to students, but appears to be highly lenient and flexible. It is a great class for those who need additional teacher flexibility, but terribly frustrating for those who do not. Because of her complicated life, test scores and feedback occur late or never.

Not on time for class.  Teaches from slides and websites mainly.  Most work will be done on your own.  Still need to pay attention to websites as 1 or 2 essay questions will be from them.  Hard to reach for outside of class questions.

Nice lady, but rarely on time for class, very late giving back test grades. Two major projects in class. Test aren't too difficult but you have to study and there are always essays! Overall not bad class but kinda disorganized and a bit frustrating.
Take her for as many marketing classes as you can. She is Great!
so easy and a really fun class!
